trans-unit.source: I'm the one who loves the silence of the wilderness, follows the call of the birds and experiences nature as his own symphony.
I love to travel and explore new places, meet new people and learn about different cultures. I'm always ready for a new adventure.
As electronics enthusiast i spend my free time drawing schematics, writing code and turning my apartment into a high-tech lab.

Hey, I'm Alex, a passionate software developer focused on turning ideas into elegant, functional solutions. Whether it's web development, mobile apps, or exploring the latest technology, I'm driven by a love of innovation and problem solving. Let's connect and bring your projects to life!

As a dedicated web developer, I specialize in crafting visually stunning and fully functional websites. Whether you're looking to establish your online presence or enhance your existing site, I ensure top-notch quality and user satisfaction.

With my expertise in mobile and web app development, I create innovative solutions tailored to your needs. From concept to launch, I prioritize usability and performance, delivering apps that stand out in today's competitive market.

Design is my passion, and I bring creativity and flair to every project. I specialize in crafting visually captivating designs that reflect your brand identity and leave a lasting impression on your audience.
As a backend developer, I architect robust and scalable systems to power your applications. From database design to server-side logic, I ensure seamless functionality and reliability.
Your IP address has been blacklisted because you have sent an unusually high number of requests to the server! If these requests were not made maliciously, please contact me via
The request has been successfully submitted.
Invalid data sent. Please fill out the form correctly and try again.
Too many requests! Please try again later.
Alternatively, you can get in touch via the contact form.
From project tracking to the completed QR invoice - that's what snaptab offers you. All important documentation regarding your projects and employees is created, giving you full control at all times!

The application snaptab was primarily developed for craftsmen and offers a wide range of features. From time tracking to scheduling appointments, tasks, project workflows, and even creating invoices and quotes, everything is provided. All of this is enhanced with artificial intelligence and the ability to collect payments directly from customers using Stripe. Through the customer portal, customers can directly access data shared by the company.

The application is offered as a web app as well as a mobile app for Android and iOS.
Presentation website from the company waio Applications.

This website introduces WAIO Applications, my own company. Alongside information about my company, it offers two captivating games to enrich the user experience.
You can find one of these games by clicking on the "Team" tab and then pressing the "Icebreaker" button. The other game is hidden as an "easter egg" on the homepage. Simply scroll to the "For all devices" section, click on the red rectangle (which represents a phone with a scale animation).

On the subdomain image.waio.ch, we provide a straightforward tool for resizing and converting images to various formats and sizes.

The website was designed with a focus on performance and accessibility, and it is fully responsive, ensuring a seamless experience across all devices.

Most of the UI/UX part of this project is not mine.
A Flutter widget designed for image editing on any device.

The ProImageEditor is a Flutter widget designed for image editing. It provides a flexible and convenient way to integrate image editing capabilities into Flutter projects. The editor has a great hit detection ensuring that drawing actions are triggered only when the user actively hovers over the drawing area. Furthermore, the editor is highly customizable, allowing for complete adaptation to specific project requirements, and it offers effortless translation capabilities, simplifying the localization process.
Add automatic scroll animations to an angular 9+ app.

A package for implementing CSS scroll animations on elements. These animations activate when an element enters the viewport during page scrolling. Users have the flexibility to configure the animations to trigger multiple times or just once. Additionally, the package offers pre-made animations as well as the option to create custom ones to suit various requirements.
Easy way that images will fly to the middle of the screen for presentation.

A package to implement hero animations, allowing users to click on images and smoothly zoom them into a larger, immersive view, enhancing the user experience and interaction with images.

Please note that the preview below may not appear as smooth as it does in reality. This is because I reduced the frame rate of the GIF to conserve storage space.
Count numbers up and down with smooth animation.

A package that elegantly animates number changes, creating a visually engaging transition from one value to another, perfect for counting or displaying real-time data updates.

Please note that the preview below may not appear as smooth as it does in reality. This is because I reduced the frame rate of the GIF to conserve storage space.
Smarthome app to automate bee hives and gardens.

This project is a real-time control application. Users can directly program the functions of GPIO ports without requiring any programming knowledge. Additionally, users can access data about the personal beehive, including real-time temperature readings and the amount of honey produced by the bees.
All the projects listed below were both designed and coded exclusively by me.
Take a look at the portfolio to know more about Alex Frei
Attempt to keep your mind under control without getting confused.
Congratulations, you scored points and mistakes!
You made a lot of mistakes. Take it slow next time, I'm sure you can get better!
Not bad, you just made a few mistakes. But can you also do it without any mistakes?
Great job, you didn't make any mistakes. But can you score more points in that time without making any mistakes?
&nbspThe goal is to score more than 120 points without any mistakes!
&nbspBut wait a minute, you got more than 120 points?!! That's awesome, seems like you're a genius!
Your current high score is points with mistakes!

This mini-game tests your brain to see how well you can concentrate on something without being distracted. The game always shows you an item with the title “Color” or “Meaning” and a colored text. Below that, you will always see six randomly generated buttons. Your goal is to press the correct button that matches the title and text. You have two minutes to score as many points as possible with as few mistakes as possible. For example, the title is “Color” and the text is “nine” with the color “red”. In this case, you should press the button below, which has a red color. In case the title is “Meaning”, you should press the button with the number “nine”.

You can choose your own topic. For example, you can enter "Soccer" or "Angular," from which a unique quiz will be generated for you. Alternatively, you can also press "Random" below to select a random topic.
Insert a topic like Angular or Soccer
The topic must be between 3 and 20 characters long!
The topic must be a text and not a number
Great job! Your answer is correct!
I'm sorry, but the correct answer was .
One moment please The quiz will be generated. This usually takes less than 20 seconds.

This game is like the quiz show "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire." You will try to win the million, but you choose the topic. If you're unfamiliar, the rules of this quiz game are quite simple. You attempt to answer as many questions as possible until the one-million question, which progressively get more difficult. You always choose between four answers, where only one answer is correct.
It seems like you still have more to learn about this topic before you can master it. Try a new topic, and let's see if you can win more than CHF there.

It seems that you are a genius in this topic, congratulations! However, I have some disappointing news: I'm not rich, so you haven't won a million. The only reward you'll receive is the experience and enjoyment you've had ;)
Can you emerge victorious on the millionaire show with your AI-generated topic?
Do you feel tired about checking out a lot of CVs?
Let's play a mini-game to relax a bit!
Can you emerge victorious on the millionaire show with your AI-generated topic?
Attempt to keep your mind under control without getting confused.
Let's play a mini-game to relax a bit!
Worked by Brunner & Engler as Electrical-Installer
Basic training and training to become a “Wachtmeister”.
Worked by Elektro Sutter as Electrical-Installer
Service technician and project manager. After 2018 change to work only 80% that I have more time for programming.
Program an “Endless Runner” game with libGDX
Program a simple report app with libGDX for use at the current workplace.
Further training in Eschlikon at “bingesser huber elektro ag” on fiber optic splices as well as outdoor and indoor installation
To make the app more professional and simplify the programming of the app, I changed to Ionic 4.
Programing many different things such as website for company and managing tool. Creation of a web app for “Schule Rotflue” which make it easy for them to present the pedagogical concept.
Married with my wife in Vietnam.
Start converting the old “Report-App” into a professional product based on Angular and Flutter that can be sold.
